content: Keep your glorious ‘stache from being covered in a thick coat of foam by drinking your brew with the mustache beer guard. Once placed over the glass, this brass guard shields your whiskers so that you can enjoy your drink without worrying about a foamstache.

titleEN: Rick And Morty Light Up Portal Gun
content: Escape dimension C-137 with this perfect replica of Rick’s portal gun. Visit the ruined Cronenberg World, take a trip to Buttworld, systematically dismantle the Council of Ricks; with this device your imagination is the only limit!

Eliminate the annoying jingling your keys make while you walk around by placing them on the KeySmart Pro organizer with Tile. Apart from keeping your keys neatly organized, it comes with a small LED, bottle opener, and lets you locate your keys when you misplace them.

Experience the thrill of professional racing from the comfort of your living room with this full immersion racing simulator. It’s equipped with a 5 way adjustable cockpit in addition to Logitech G27 driving controls with feedback steering, a 6-speed shifter, and tri-pedal.

Add some color to your home with these incredible glow in the dark tetra fish. These tiny aquatic pets are available in one of six amazingly vibrant colors like electric green and starfire red – making them a brilliant addition to any fresh water aquarium.

Put a smile on your little Resistance fighter’s face by surprising them with this life-sized interactive Porg plush. This little scene stealing critter can flap its cute little wings and emit three phrases from the film when you squeeze its plump little belly.

Transform your harmless little feline into a fierce and intimidating king of the jungle with this lion cat hat. As long as you insist on dressing up your cat with things he’ll despise, at least make it worth his suffering by choosing this ferocious hat.

Chess just got even more strategic – the three player chess game expands on the classic strategy game while adding new elements such as alliances between two weaker players to attack the commanding player, or planning your moves against two different attacks.

This One Time, I…. is the party game guaranteed to loosen everyone up and get the fun started. Players take turns confessing all their funny, dirty, and downright crazy life stories – while you listen and see how they stack up to the questionable life choices you’ve made.

It has probably never occurred to you that your silverware could be better. That’s where Knork comes in with flatware designed for how you naturally eat. This insanely awesome, redesigned flatware concept lives up to the hype.

Stop locking and unlocking your home like a caveman. Now you can open and close your home’s door like a modern man by using the app controlled door lock. With the swipe of a finger on your fancy smartphone, your door magically locks and unlocks on command.

Keep a watchful eye on babysitters, contractors, housekeepers, or just anyone who enters your home by discreetly recording them using this AC adapter hidden spy camera. This motion activated camera records 720×480 HD Video at 30 FPS using an SD card.

Have a little fun while you nurture and rejuvenate your skin by using these baby animal sheet masks. Each thermo-sensitive color fading mask transforms your boring old human face into an adorable little animal like a seal, a panda, a cute kitty, or a pug.

If it’s power and stealth that you’re looking for, the Rambo R1000XP extreme power bike will deliver! It comes equipped with fat high traction tires ideal for off-roading, a powerful 750W motor with a top speed of 20 mph, and a range of 19 miles.

Add a touch of fun and excitement to your dull backyard landscape with this giant premium chess set. The set comes with 32 giant pieces  – 16 white and 16 black – with the tallest piece measuring 25 inches and the pawns standing at a respectable 16 inches.

Wow onlookers with your impeccable fashion sense when you show up wearing the eye catching pepperoni pizza onesie. It will transform your entire body into a greasy slice of pepperoni pizza – making it ideal for wearing out to job interviews and special events.

Make the unpleasant task of unclogging the toilet a little less shitty using this poop emoji plunger. The plunger head comes designed like the iconic poop emoji, making it great for adding a humorous touch to your bathroom’s decor.

Add some geeky flair to your humble abode by transforming your appliances into giant gaming devices with these Game Boy refrigerator magnets. This set of dry erase friendly magnets will instantly turn any appliance with a metal surface into a giant Game Boy.

What better way to top off a fine meal than with these scotch infused toothpicks? Crafted from sustainably forested wood, each toothpick is soaked in a premium barrel-aged Islay single malt that will provide a distinctively smoky flavor with hints of peat and caramel.

Safeguard your valuables in the event of a flood or fire by storing them inside this fireproof/waterproof money bag. The bag is made with a layer of silicon coated fiberglass with heat blocking aluminum foil that can resist flames up to 1100°F.

Keep your pet’s luscious furry coat from ending up all over your furniture with help from these pet deshedding brush gloves. The gloves are equipped with 180 soft rubber tips that provide a relaxing massage while removing dirt, dander, and loose hair.

Keep a steady supply of fresh food at your home by growing your very own avocado tree using this simple kit. This small plastic gadget incorporates a hole at the center where you place an avocado pit to facilitate the germination process.

Give any part of your home an out-of-this-world touch by decorating with one of these purple galaxy wall decals. These highly detailed and vibrant decals are made from high quality PVC, are waterproof, and won’t leave behind a sticky mark on your floor, ceiling, or walls.

Freaking out your house mates is now easier than ever with this remote control cockroach. This high-tech battery operated creepy crawler features life-like movements and is small enough to easily be carried in your pocket when it is not in use.

Bring your living room into the 21st century with the Sobro coffee table drink cooler. Apart from the ample refrigerated compartment, this versatile piece comes with built-in LED lights, charging ports, and Bluetooth speakers.

Have a keyboard with you anywhere you go with this virtual infrared keyboard. This virtual infrared keyboard projector is the size of a cell phone, yet allows you have the functionality of a full size keyboard – with the added benefit of wireless Bluetooth technology.

Show your meat-loving better half how much they mean to you by surprising them with a savory beef jerky bouquet. Each stunning flower in this delectable bouquet is expertly made from quality beef jerky – available in either original, hot, or teriyaki flavors.

This snuggle pillow will always be a shoulder for you to lie and cry on. This pillow is machine washable, includes the removable t-shirt, and also is a great neck pillow. It makes a great gift for those forever alone types or anyone on the rebound.

If you like to bike at night and want to make sure you’ll always be seen by oncoming traffic then these LED bike wheel lights are for you. Along with providing safety, they also look incredible with 32 full color LEDs that easily install onto your existing bike’s wheels.

Beer and rock and roll have always gone together nicely, but this signature Marshall amp fridge takes the relationship to a whole new level. With control knobs that go all the way up to 11, this incredible fridge will hold up to 4.4 cubic feet of face melting booze.

Get your restless tike excited about bedtime by tucking him into this Captain America duvet cover. The bold and vivid graphic emblazoned on this cover transforms your little guy into the mighty leader of the Avengers when they are tucked in.

Bring together seemingly opposite food pairings like never before using this yin yang serving bowl. Each of these handmade aluminum bowls are shaped like one half of the yin yang symbol and come with their own curved spoon – so you can serve up two flavors at once.

Stop having loose change, pieces of food, cell phones, or even your car keys fall into that merciless black hole between your car seat and the center console. This car seat gap catcher works for any car, simply slide it in place and the gap will be completely filled!

Stay organized and quit poisoning your body with ink when writing self reminders on your arms, wrists, and hands. Now you can write a reminder to yourself using these wrist watch post it notes that you wear on your wrist like a regular watch or bracelet.

Ward off wrinkles and fine lines just like the ancients did with this pure 24K gold facial mask. Being one of the softest metals, gold is easily absorbed into the skin to aid in the reversal of oxidation damage to the collagen fibers, thus helping in the regeneration of new cells.

If your small pet struggles to stay warm during the cold winters then you should consider keeping Mr. Fluffums warm this winter season with these stylish pet hoodies. Made from 100% cotton, these sleeved pet hoodies will make your pet feel cool while helping him stay warm.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Toilet Paper
content: Now you’ll no longer struggle to relieve yourself during those half awake bathroom visits in the middle of the night with this glow in the dark toilet paper. Functional and fun, you’ll know you’re getting a complete wipe when the toilet paper stops glowing.

When you need to stay safe from the rain but also want to keep your man ego intact, a sword handle umbrella is the only solution. From broad swords to samurai swords, you’ll look like a waterproof warlord walking around with any one of these umbrellas.

These stackable water and food containers are ideal for maximizing limited storage during disaster relief. The containers are crafted from durable plastic and come with a set of ridges on the exterior that allows them to be easily and securely stacked on top of one another.

Want to own an iPad but don’t have the cash? Now you can be the proud owner of the original iPad – the notePad! This poor man’s iPad sports a minimalistic design with intuitive user controls and features paper thin materials for extreme light weight mobility.

If you could only pack one light source during your next camping trip, make sure it’s the ultimate multifunctional flashlight. This smartphone charging lantern flashlight with a 72 hour run time can be hung, propped up, or held like a regular flashlight that emits a 700 foot beam.

Set the world on fire with these Earth shaped fire pits. Each of these eye-catching fire pits is hand cut from durable carbon steel with an iron oxide finish that will provide you with years of aesthetically pleasing yet functional fires.

Add a wild west themed page to your ever-expanding cat photo album by dressing up Mr. Whiskers in this adorable cowboy costume. This little ensemble is made from polyester and fits over your kitty’s two front legs for added comfort.

Make your game room just as fun as an arcade with the addition of the full size air hockey table. This fully loaded table stands on heavy duty ABS legs and features an overhead LED unit in addition to a patented blower system that delivers fast, non-stop action.

Ensure your next project is done right from the start by measuring everything precisely using this 2-in-1 laser tape measure. It features a simple one-handed operation and comes with both a standard 16 foot tape measure in addition to a 50 foot laser tape.

When your four legged friend’s furry coat just won’t cut it, this shearling fleece winter dog coat will ensure he remains warm and toasty. This faux suede coat comes with a thin and fluffy polyester fleece lining that will keep his torso snug and warm.

Keep one of your most valued makeup accessories good as new with this rechargeable makeup brush cleaner. It’s compact enough to fit on any nightstand or table and quickly cleans your brush in a just a few seconds.

Liven up family game night by keeping everyone on the edge of their seats with the Suspend balance game. You and 3 friends will go head to head trying to balance 1 of 24 small rubber tipped rods onto the main structure without knocking it down.

Show the kiddies how magical nighttime can be as you illuminate their world with glow in the dark bubbles. The special solution gives off an incredible orange glow that turns each bubble into a mini lantern great for livening up any dim environment.

Take your workouts to the extreme by increasing the versatility  of your existing equipment with the kettlebell dumbbell clamp. It directly clamps on to the bar and instantly transforms it into a fully functional kettlebell that you can use with various weights.

Send your taste buds to a galaxy far, far away with these Millennium Falcon waffles. This officially licensed waffle maker whips up Millennium Falcon shaped waffles that accurately depict the fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy – right down to the side cockpit.

Automatically provide lighting as your walk around the bedroom at night with the motion activated bedlight. The bedlight conveniently installs under the bed frame and emits a gentle glow that lights up just enough to provide visibility in the middle the night.

Move over Nutella, there’s a new sheriff in town and its name is chocolate chip peanut butter. When you really want to pack on the pounds while giving yourself a mouthgasm, this peanut-buttery chocolate spread is your premiere choice.

Give any room in your home a modern minimalist touch by lighting it up with the 85 lamps chandelier. The bold design of the chandelier is made from dozens of simple hanging bulbs that come together to create an opulent lighting fixture.

Enjoy using and playing with your wagon year-round by upgrading to this convertible garden wagon sleigh. It can go from wagon to sled in mere minutes, and features a sturdy hardwood deck along with an extra long anti-tip steering handle for an effortless pull.

Improve your home security without incurring expensive security system costs – these welcome mats let any potential burglar know the contents of your home pale in comparison too your neighbors – despite your disposition for buying overpriced junk from this website.

This magnetic dart board delivers all the fun of the classic bar game without the risk of losing an eye. The tips of each dart come with a small yet powerful magnet that easily sticks onto the metallic board upon making contact.

No matter where you are or what you’re doing, the SOG flint and defense tool is something you’ll always want to have on you. This compact pen-shaped tool comes with everything from a fire starter, to a safety whistle, and a carbide-tipped glass breaker.

Predict the weather in a time tested method by using this weather forecast storm glass. The special solution in this water droplet shaped glass reacts to changes in the atmosphere causing it to shift in between a clear and murky state depending on the weather.

Go from working hard to hardly working while sitting on this reclining zero gravity chair. When fully reclined, its ergonomic design elevates your legs above your heart so that you can experience a relaxing sense of weightlessness.

Quit rummaging around and instantly find what you’re looking for by toting this motion activated purse light in your handbag. It comes equipped with proximity sensors that automatically turn on the light for a period of ten seconds when you stick your hand inside.

Roughing it in the great outdoors will seem like a breeze when you reside inside the connecting tree tents. The unique design allows campers to dwell in a sizable tent suspended off the ground – while connecting with other tents around you!

Carry your newly born baby with ease thanks to the Peekaru hands free baby carrying jacket. The Peekaru is a cool gift idea for parents who live active lifestyles and want the ease of carrying around their baby while still being able to use their hands freely.

Setting up a mobile workstation anywhere you want is now possible thanks to the Wuteku portable standing chair desk. The simple and functional design transform the back of any chair into a compact and sturdy place to get your work done.

Pouring is boring – streamline the process of getting alcohol into your system using this wine bottle glass attachment. The high quality borosilicate glass fits directly onto the top of any wine bottle – turning each bottle into your own personal jumbo cup.

Ensure you’re nice and toasty when the temperature plummets by slipping into this heated hoodie. These winter threads come with a built-in 4400 mAh battery designed to heat the front and back zones of your torso, so that you remain as warm as possible at all times.

Bring the majesty and beauty of the heavens to your home with the starfield simulation light. An ideal gift for astronomy enthusiasts, this small gadget features a rotating base that projects a map of the stars onto the walls for an accurate and in depth look at the cosmos.

Prepping your veggies is simpler than ever with this fruit and vegetable chopping container. This lightweight portable chopper comes with an ingenious design that lets you slice, dice, and chop simply by pressing down with just one hand.

Unlike humans that only use 3% of their brain for hearing, cats devote an astounding 25%. Music for cats was created by a professional musician using state of the art equipment that is scientifically proven to elicit positive reactions and enrich their lives.

Throw out that disgusting germ-infested brush and swap it out for the Boie anti-bacterial toothbrush. This innovative toothbrush comes with silver embedded bristles along with a specialized head that helps kill bacteria – for a more hygienic brushing experience.

titleEN: The Floor Is Lava Floor/Wall Decal
content: THE FLOOR IS LAVA! Maintain a lively atmosphere at home by keeping everyone on their toes with this floor is lava floor/wall decal. This incredible 3D decal turns a simple trip down the hallway into a heart-pumping experience that surely put your agility to the test.

Go on an adventure! Within this book are 100 weird, random, and totally adult adventures. Flip to a random page when you’re bored, stuck, looking for things to do, or just crave new stories and adventures. We’ve got your next 100 adventures wrapped, bound, and ready!

Cut out the middleman and start making tasty treats in your own kitchen with this chocolate candy bar maker. After melting the chocolate on the heated base, simply pour it into one of the four silicone molds to cool off and then customize it with yummy toppings.

Nobody likes a smelly Jedi, so keep clean and dry yourself off after a nice cleansing shower with these Jedi bath robes. They are officially licensed Star Wars bath robes and come in a one size fits all – even Jabba himself could fit in one of these.

Drawing Without Dignity is like the uncensored and naughty version of Pictionary. In this crass, crude, and hysterical drawing game for adults, players take turns drawing dirty pictures from 1 of the 670 inappropriate topics displayed on the cards.

Let those little rascals know they were naughty without actually ruining their Christmas by placing these charcoal candy canes in their stockings. The set comes with six dark “charcoal” candy canes that taste like smoke, cinnamon, and bitter disappointment.

Avoid having your home smell like a cesspool of feline excrement by letting your kitties take care of business inside the continuous cleaning litter box. The machine runs quietly, requires no additional bags or tools, and works continuously when it’s not in use by your gato.

Transform yourself into a walking canvas by heading out of the house in one of these interactive UV light shirts. These 100% cotton threads come with a UV-light keychain that allows you create doodles over the white area that will remain visible for ten minutes.

Make your next bonfire look like fucking sorcery by incorporating some reflective fire glass. Apart from giving your fire an other-worldly appearance, the glass pieces provide hours of heat long after you turn the gas off.

titleEN: Smooth Baby Soft Foot Exfoliation Mask
content: Give your poor, tired feet the pampering they deserve by rejuvenating them with this smooth baby soft foot exfoliation mask. It is specially designed with skin moisturizing ingredients that will help get rid of dull, coarse, and dead skin.

Turn your skinny legs into your body’s most attractive feature by walking out in these chicken leg socks. These highly fashionable knee high socks are made to provide all day comfort and make the perfect gift for the free-spirited fashion forward person in your life.

Nothing says Christmas like some good ol’ rotisserie chicken. So get into the holiday spirit by snacking on these delectable rotisserie chicken flavored candy canes. These festive and oddly flavored treats come in packs of six so that you can share and spread the love.

Experience a classic pastime in a whole new light by engaging in a rousing game of modern capture the flag. Instead of an actual flag, you play with a visually dynamic compact light up ball – making it ideal for night time matches.

Doze off to a soothing soundtrack every night by going to bed wearing these sleeping band headphones. This Bluetooth enabled headband features a battery life of 13 hours, a wireless range of 15-30 feet, and is available in two equally soft and comfortable types of fabric.

Create a romantic candle-lit ambiance without running the risk of accidentally burning down your home by using these flame simulating LED light bulbs. These energy saving LEDs are designed to flicker like real candles to give off an inviting warm glow.

Ensure you remain properly hydrated the next time you head outdoors by bringing along this portable cooler backpack. This waterproof cooler features ample storage space and comes with an insulated foam layer for true multi-day ice retention.

titleEN: Puzzle Plush Squeaking Toys for Dogs
content: Keep your loyal pooch entertained and active at home with these puzzle plush squeaking toys for dogs. Available in sizes ranging from small to extra large, each stump is riddled with multiple holes – that each hide a little sneaky and squeaky stuffed animal squirrel.

Light up the night by wearing this fiber optic hoodie. This unique and fashionable garment is made with more than half a mile of fiber optic thread that is designed to make the hoodie glow bright in either red, green, blue, or purple.

Pillow fights aren’t just a kid’s game anymore – pick up your battle axe and get ready for things to get ugly – the pillow wars have begun! These weapon shaped pillows include a scimitar, a grenade, nunchucks, a ninja star, a battle axe, and even a light saber!

Add a touch of prehistoric whimsy to your kitchen or bathroom with this little Brontosaurus paper towel holder. This pint-sized dino is crafted from dense poly-resin that will stand up against bumps and falls and can accommodate either paper towels or toilet paper rolls.

Bowl a perfect game of 300 from the comfort of your own backyard with the giant inflatable bowling pins! These ginormous pins each stand at 29″ tall and provide kids and adults with an exhilarating game of bowling the likes of which have never been experienced before.

Fix any electronic gadget that comes your way by carrying this professional tech toolkit. The kit includes a wide range of high-end tools ranging from precision tweezers to a 64 bit driver kit – all neatly organized into a compact tool roll.

Give your little paleontologist in training a sugary surprise they’re sure to love by making them their very own 3D chocolate T-Rex using this food-safe silicone mold. This building toy and confectionery tool makes it remarkable easy to make your own little 6 inch T-Rex.

Why settle for puny 13″ or 15″ screens when you can simply lug around your giant 27″ iMac everywhere you go using this fashionable carrying case. It’s expertly crafted from genuine leather and thick felt that is designed to protect your PC while you tote it around.

Make your little speed demon’s dreams a reality by getting them behind the wheel of this Power Wheels Cars 3 Lighting McQueen. It comes with movie-accurate detailing and graphics, emits cool sounds and phrases from the film, and can reach speeds of 3 mph.

Easily improve your posture no matter where you sit by putting on this perfect posture strap. It wraps around your knees and lower back to stabilize your pelvis so your spine’s natural curvature is restored, helping to reduce lower back pain.

Start enjoying your prized wine from the moment you open the bottle by using the instant wine chiller and aerator. Pouring the wine through it instantly aerates it while simultaneously lowering it down to the ideal drinking temperature.

Make cassettes king once again by increasing your home’s hipness factor with this cassette tape coffee table. The nostalgic design of this pinewood table features a gigantic cassette tape decal on the surface along with three small drawer-like compartments.

Prepare a variety of fried foods without all the grease and fat of traditional frying methods by using this air fryer and multicooker. It features a powerful halogen heating mechanism and several cooking functions so that you can fry, roast, boil, bake, and saute.

Feel as though you’re flying over the pavement without actually leaving the ground by hopping on this free-style hoverboard. This self-balancing scooter holds up to 220 pounds, features a cruising speed of 7 miles per hour and a range of 6.5 miles on a single charge.
